get.summary: Get an address OR Update an address.
get.description: Get an address OR update an address.

parameters.description: string ->
parameters.name: person_id

parameters.description: string -> MAL|PRM|RES|WRK|EML
parameters.name: address_type

parameters.description: First line - required to update address
parameters.name: line1

parameters.description: Second line - not required to update
parameters.name: line2

parameters.description: Third line - not required to update
parameters.name: line3

parameters.description: Fourth line - Not required to update
parameters.name: line4

parameters.description: City address is within - required to update address
parameters.name: city

parameters.description: State province or region address is in - required to update address
parameters.name: state_province_region

parameters.description: Postal code - required to update address
parameters.name: postal_code

parameters.description: Country - required to update address
parameters.name: country

parameters.description: Is the address unlisted - not required to update address
parameters.name: unlisted

parameters.description: Is address a campus address - not required to update address
parameters.name: campus_address

parameters.description: Is their mailing residence same as address - not required to update
parameters.name: mailing_residence_same
